Stefano_package.components

Class CadComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • Stefano_package.components.CadComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICadComponent
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CadArc, CadCircle, CadComponent3D, CadLineOrtho, CadRectangle

    public abstract class CadComponent
extends java.lang.Object
implements ICadComponent
    This class is the two dimensional main realization of the interface ICadComponent, still is abstract as the concrete elements will derive from this one the main fields.
    Author:
    Stefano Demarchi
